decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s):

MOUr57_PL_EX_001 REV A:Site Location Plan; MOUr57_PL_EX_002 REV A: Site Map; MOUr57_PL_EX_100 REV A: Existing Ground Floor Plan; MOUr57_PL_EX_101 REV A: Existing First Floor Plan; MOUr57_PL_EX_200 REV A: Existing Section AA; MOUr57_PL_EX_300 REV A: Existing Front Elevation; MOUr57_PL_EX_301 REV A: Existing Side Elevation; MOUr57_PL_EX_302 REV A:Existing Rear Elevation; MOUr57_PL_EX_303 REV A: Existing Side Elevation; MOUr57_PL_GA_100 REV A: Proposed Ground Floor Plan; MOUr57_PL_GA_101 REV A: Proposed First Floor Plan; MOUr57_PL_GA_200 REV A: Proposed Section AA; MOUr57_PL_GA_300 REV A: Proposed Front Elevation; MOUr57_PL_GA_301 REV A: Proposed Side Elevation; MOUr57_PL_GA_302 REV A: Proposed Rear Elevation; MOUr57_PL_GA_303 REV A : Proposed Side Elevation
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
subdivision_of_building: Works to the existing rear ground floor extension.
description: Enlargement of the existing rear extension with 3 rooflights, relocate the existing window and erection of a new access ramp.
